column2: {"name":"1 Look, listen and repeat.","imgs":[{"section":"a","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U11-L1-1-1-jnuymyqtcmsjxwom.jpg","width":"","height":"","texts":[{"content":"Who's that man?","speaker":"Linda","class":"","begin":"12","end":"15.1"},{"content":"He's my father.","speaker":"Mai","class":"","begin":"18.2","end":"19.7"},{"content":"Really? He's young!","speaker":"Linda","class":"","begin":"22.7","end":"25.4"}]},{"section":"b","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U11-L1-1-2-ihiqzaszlmgaonfy.jpg","width":"","height":"","texts":[{"content":"And that's my mother next to him.","speaker":"Mai","class":"","begin":"29.7","end":"31.9"},{"content":"She's nice!","speaker":"Linda","class":"","begin":"34.8","end":"36.2"}]}],"audio":"/audio/TA3T2SHS/U11-L1-1.mp3","pageNumber":"6"}
column11:
{"topic":"Các thành viên trong gia đình.","objective":"Làm quen với tình huống trong đó hai bạn hỏi và trả lời các thành
viên trong gia đình.","context":"Linda hỏi Mai về người bố.","languageFocus":"Cách hỏi và trả lời người kia là ai Who’s that man? He’s my
father.
Cách nói khi khen ai trẻ He’s young!"}

column2: {"name":"1 Look, listen and repeat.","imgs":[{"section":"a","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U11-L2-1-1-cdnpjrirsrjmevsm.jpg","width":"6","height":"4","texts":[{"content":"That's my brother.","speaker":"Mai","class":"","begin":"8.0","end":"10.7"},{"content":"How old is your brother?","speaker":"Linda","class":"","begin":"13.8","end":"15.6"},{"content":"He's seven.","speaker":"Mai","class":"","begin":"18.6","end":"19.7"}]},{"section":"b","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U11-L2-1-2-zhzhblfhfvfqavwj.jpg","width":"","height":"","texts":[{"content":"That's my grandmother.","speaker":"Mai","class":"","begin":"24.1","end":"25.8"},{"content":"How old is she?","speaker":"Linda","class":"28.9","begin":"30.1","end":""},{"content":"She's sixty-five.","speaker":"Mai","class":"","begin":"33.2","end":"35.1"}]}],"audio":"/audio/TA3T2SHS/U11-L2-1.mp3","pageNumber":"8"}
column11: {"topic":"Tuổi các thành viên trong gia đình","objective":"Làm quen với tình huống trong đó hai bạn hỏi và trả lời về tuổi\n\ncác thành viên trong gia đình.","context":"Linda hỏi Mai về tuổi của em trai.","languageFocus":"Cách hỏi và trả lời về tuổi How old is your brother? He’s seven."}

column2: {"name":"1 Look, listen and repeat.","imgs":[{"section":"a","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U12-L1-1-1-fcubzjmuuwmnpwxz.jpg","width":"6","height":"4","texts":[{"content":"This is my house.","speaker":"Mai","class":"","begin":"12.0","end":"14.4"},{"content":"Wow! It's big!","speaker":"Linda","class":"","begin":"17.5","end":"19.9"}]},{"section":"b","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U12-L1-1-2-ebbcnljoevzztnru.jpg","width":"","height":"","texts":[{"content":"There's a garden over there.[25.9] [28.8]Come and see it.","speaker":"Mai","class":"","begin":"24.2","end":"30.0"},{"content":"It's very nice!","speaker":"Linda","class":"","begin":"33.0","end":"34.7"}]}],"audio":"/audio/TA3T2SHS/U12-L1-1.mp3","pageNumber":"12"}
column11: {"topic":"Phòng trong nhà","objective":"Làm quen với tình huống trong đó Mai giới thiệu Linda về nhà của mình.","context":"Mai giới thiệu Linda về nhà của mình.","languageFocus":"Cách nói khi giới thiệu nhà mình This is my house.\nCách nói khi khen ngợi cái gì: It’s very nice!"}

column2: {"name":"1 Look, listen and repeat.","imgs":[{"section":"a","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U12-L2-1-1-frwqckpgtawalcjy.jpg","width":"6","height":"4","texts":[{"content":"This is the living room.","speaker":"Tony","class":"","begin":"9.2","end":"11.0"},{"content":"Wow! [14.8]It's nice![15.8] [18.9]Is there a garden?","speaker":"Quan","class":"","begin":"14.1","end":"20.1"},{"content":"Yes,[23.6] there is.[24.2] [27.2]Come and see it.","speaker":"Tony","class":"","begin":"23.1","end":"28.1"}]},{"section":"b","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U12-L2-1-2-ondxpurqkppibhzm.jpg","width":"","height":"","texts":[{"content":"Is there a fence?","speaker":"Quan","class":"","begin":"32.3","end":"33.9"},{"content":"No, there isn't.","speaker":"Tony","class":"","begin":"37.0","end":"38.1"}]}],"audio":"/audio/TA3T2SHS/U12-L2-1.mp3","pageNumber":"14"}
column11: {"topic":"Quang cảnh xung quanh nhà","objective":"Làm quen với tình huống trong đó hai bạn hỏi và trả lời xác định có vườn ở nhà.","context":"Tony giới thiệu Phong về nhà của mình.","languageFocus":"Cách hỏi có vườn quanh nhà không: Is there a garden?\nCách trả lời xác định có: Yes, there is."}

column2: {"name":"1 Look, listen and repeat.","imgs":[{"section":"a","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U13-L1-1-1-scclldcfshpcqpfs.jpg","width":"6","height":"4","texts":[{"content":"Where's my book, Mum? I can't see it in my room!","speaker":"Peter","class":"","begin":"11.0","end":"19.2"},{"content":"It's here, dear. On the chair.","speaker":"Peter's Mum","class":"","begin":"22.2","end":"25.3"}]},{"section":"b","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U13-L1-1-2-drlyulbwhseklnpe.jpg","width":"","height":"","texts":[{"content":"Is the pen there too, Mum?","speaker":"Peter","class":"","begin":"29.5","end":"31.7"},{"content":"No, it's not on the chair. It's there, on the table.","speaker":"Peter's Mum","class":"","begin":"34.6","end":"40.5"}]}],"audio":"/audio/TA3T2SHS/U13-L1-1.mp3","pageNumber":"18"}
column11: {"topic":"Đồ dùng trong nhà (số ít)","objective":"Làm quen với tình huống trong đó các nhân vật hỏi và trả lời về vị trí đồ vật trong nhà.","context":"Bé trai hỏi mẹ về vị trí cuốn sách, người mẹ trả lời.","languageFocus":"Cách hỏi và trả lời vị trí đồ vật Where’s my book? It’s here, dear. On the chair."}

column2: {"name":"1 Look, listen and repeat.","imgs":[{"section":"a","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U13-L2-1-1-cvqtywfllkvbwgjq.jpg","width":"6","height":"4","texts":[{"content":"Where are my posters, Mum?","speaker":"Peter","class":"","begin":"10.1","end":"12.4"},{"content":"I don't know, dear. Look in your bedroom.","speaker":"Peter's Mum","class":"","begin":"15.5","end":"21.7"}]},{"section":"b","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U13-L2-1-2-wkxdexbnuscdmwjr.jpg","width":"","height":"","texts":[{"content":"Oh, they're under my bed. Thanks, Mum.","speaker":"Peter","class":"","begin":"25.9","end":"29.2"}]}],"audio":"/audio/TA3T2SHS/U13-L2-1.mp3","pageNumber":"20"}
column11: {"topic":"Đồ dùng trong nhà (số nhiều)","objective":"àm quen với tình huống trong đó hai mẹ con hỏi và trả lời về vị trí đồ vật trong nhà (số nhiều).","context":"Con trai hỏi mẹ về vị trí của những bức tranh (số nhiều).","languageFocus":"Cách hỏi về vị trí đồ vật (số nhiều)  Where are my poster, Mum? \nCách nói không biết I don’t know, dear. \nCác nói khi khuyên làm việc gì Look in your bedroom."}

column2: {"name":"1 Look, listen and repeat.","imgs":[{"section":"a","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U14-L1-1-1-axtlmtzzjhjwdkjg.jpg","width":"6","height":"4","texts":[{"content":"This is a picture of my room.","speaker":"Mai","class":"","begin":"13.0","end":"16.5"},{"content":"Are there any chairs in the room?","speaker":"Linda","class":"","begin":"19.5","end":"21.8"},{"content":"Yes, there are.","speaker":"Mai","class":"","begin":"24.8","end":"26.3"}]},{"section":"b","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U14-L1-1-2-uprnmiluvwoneyac.jpg","width":"","height":"","texts":[{"content":"Are there any posters in the room?","speaker":"Linda","class":"","begin":"30.6","end":"33.0"},{"content":"No, there aren't.","speaker":"Mai","class":"","begin":"35.9","end":"37.9"}]}],"audio":"/audio/TA3T2SHS/U14-L1-1.mp3","pageNumber":"24"}
column5: Unit 14 Are there any posters in the room?

column2: {"name":"1 Look, listen and repeat.","imgs":[{"section":"a","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U14-L2-1-1-vkxgdvqmgrmbxcpv.jpg","width":"6","height":"4","texts":[{"content":"How many chairs are there?","speaker":"Peter","class":"","begin":"10.0","end":"12.4"},{"content":"Let's count them. One, two, three,....There are eight.","speaker":"Quan","class":"","begin":"15.4","end":"23.4"}]},{"section":"b","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U14-L2-1-2-gjcdqirbknuypcas.jpg","width":"","height":"","texts":[{"content":"And how many cups are there?","speaker":"Quan","class":"","begin":"27.6","end":"30.3"},{"content":"There are six.","speaker":"Peter","class":"","begin":"33.3","end":"34.7"}]}],"audio":"/audio/TA3T2SHS/U14-L2-1.mp3","pageNumber":"26"}
column5: Unit 14 Are there any posters in the room?

column2: {"name":"1 Look, listen and repeat.","imgs":[{"section":"a","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U15-L1-1-1-nbwarjmnvbokocvy.jpg","width":"6","height":"4","texts":[{"content":"What's that?","speaker":"Mai","class":"","begin":"13.0","end":"15.7"},{"content":"It's my robot. column2: {"name":"1 Look, listen and repeat.","imgs":[{"section":"a","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U16-L1-1-1-vupwywnmjododgub.jpg","width":"6","height":"4","texts":[{"content":"That's my dog.","speaker":"Quan","class":"","begin":"11.5","end":"14.3"},{"content":"Wow! column2: {"name":"1 Look, listen and repeat.","imgs":[{"section":"a","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U16-L2-1-1-lffmkyvlerhgpqoh.jpg","width":"6","height":"4","texts":[{"content":"Where are my cats, Mum?","speaker":"Nam","class":"","begin":"9.3","end":"11.0"},{"content":"They're over there, under the table.","speaker":"Nam's Mum","class":"","begin":"14.1","end":"17.0"}]},{"section":"b","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U16-L2-1-2-ytcserotiryjnabr.jpg","width":"","height":"","texts":[{"content":"Is the dog there with the cats, Mum?","speaker":"Nam","class":"","begin":"21.2","end":"23.6"},{"content":"No. He's in the garden. {"name":"1 Look, listen and repeat.","imgs":[{"section":"a","url":"/images/TA3T2SHS/U19-L2-1-1-jrgfsfapkazqiqzv.jpg","width":"6","height":"4","texts":[{"content":"Hello, Mai. This is Linda.
